fr.d2factory.libraryapp.library

Interface Library

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LibraryFactory

    public interface Library
    The library class is in charge of stocking the books and managing the return delays and members The books are available via the BookRepository

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Book borrowBook(long isbnCode, Member member, java.time.LocalDate borrowedAt)
      A member is borrowing a book from our library.
      void returnBook(Book book, Member member)
      A member returns a book to the library.

    • Method Detail

      • borrowBook

        Book borrowBook(long isbnCode,
                Member member,
                java.time.LocalDate borrowedAt)
         throws HasLateBooksException
        A member is borrowing a book from our library.
        Parameters:
        isbnCode - the isbn code of the book
        member - the member who is borrowing the book
        borrowedAt - the date when the book was borrowed
        Returns:
        the book the member wishes to obtain if found
        Throws:
        HasLateBooksException - in case the member has books that are late
        See Also:
        ISBN, Member

      • returnBook

        void returnBook(Book book,
                Member member)
        A member returns a book to the library. We should calculate the tarif and probably charge the member
        Parameters:
        book - the Book they return
        member - the Member who is returning the book
        See Also:
        Member.payBook(int)
